headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Predicting Broadridge Financial Solutions Stock Will Climb or Sink?
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions has significantly underperformed the broader market over the past year, though analysts continue to hold a cautiously optimistic outlook on the stock’s longer-term prospects.
